description:
VSCodium is a community-driven, freely-licensed and telemetry-free rebuilt of Microsoft's Visual Studio Code.

VSCodium is a community-driven, freely-licensed and telemetry-free rebuilt of Microsoft's Visual Studio Code.
VSCodium is a powerful IDE which runs on your desktop and is available for Windows, macOS and Linux.
update vscode to 1.95.3What's Changed
- add s390x support for REH by @andreasgrapentin in #2099
- ci: generate better release notes by @daiyam in #2103
- docs: remove infringing urls by @daiyam in #2113
Known Issues
- on Linux, crash when attempting to open File menu #2082
New Contributors
- @andreasgrapentin made their first contribution in #2099
Full Changelog: https://github.com/VSCodium/vscodium/compare/1.95.2.24313...1.95.3.24320x86 64bits
